casebody.data:
No. 72,

Misc.

Lartigue v. R. J. Reynolds Tobacco Co. et al. H. Alva Brumfield, Sylvia Roberts and Melvin M. Belli for petitioner. Harry McCall, Harry B. Kelleher, Theodore Kiendl, Porter R. Chandler and Edwin J. Jacob for respondents.

Motion to use record in No. 386,. Misc., October Term, 1963, granted. Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States.Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit-denied.
